content:
IETF WEBDAV Working Group Meeting

Washington, DC IETF

December 8-9, 1997

A meeting of the WEBDAV Working Group was held on December 8-9, 1997 at the Washington, DC IETF meeting.

Minutes
Brief Overview

Slides shown at the meeting:

Howard Palmer, Access Control Rerquirements
